resources.string: Your must be more than 8 characters
To reset your password enter the same email that was used during registration and a link would sent to that address for reseting your password
Your password reset was successful, a link has been sent to email address you entered for password reset click on the button below to continue to login
Your password reset was not successful this might be due to poor or no internet connection, click on the button below to try again
Enter the email address .that was used for registration a link for password will be sent to the inputed email address for password rest
